solution_line_template: At the start, there were {initial_racers} racers, who were joined by {joined_racers} more racers, thus {initial_racers}+{joined_racers} =<<{initial_racers}+{joined_racers}={racers_after_join}>>{racers_after_join} racers
After 30 more minutes, the number of racers doubled, totaling {racers_after_join}*{doubling_factor} = {total_racers} racers.
If the number of racers who finished is {finished_racers}, the {total_racers}-{finished_racers} = {dropped_racers} racers dropped before finishing.
